name: Arcane Architect
description:
Once per turn on this unit's phase, at any point aside from mid-combat, Castiel may apply one mode to @{tooltip:Reason tile(s):Ice Block, Fire Patch, Wind Torrent, Lightning Arc, or Force Wall} within Range 10:
 1. Destroy up to X target tiles and regain 1 SP per tile destroyed.
 2. Move X target tiles X spaces.
 3. Convert X target tiles of one type into Reason tiles of another type (besides @{tile:Force Wall:Force Walls}).
 4. Extend the duration of X wall tiles by one turn. 
 5. Deal (Castiel's Mag - target's Res) nonlethal damage to up to X targets adjacent to target tile and destroy target tile.
Where X is 1d4 rolled before choosing a mode.
